accountDeletion_confirm_content_title: Do you really want to delete your account?
accountDeletion_confirm_content_text: For security, please enter your password.
accountDeletion_successful_content_title: Your account is noted for deletion
accountDeletion_successful_content_text:
The request to delete your account has been successfully noted. Your account will be permanently deleted in the next few hours.

You will now be logged out.
deleteAccount_content_title: Do you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount_content_text:
You will no longer be able to create reservations, receive recommendations based on your preferences and set favourites.

Your existing budget will be lost. Deletion is not reversible.
deleteAccount_content_link: For more information on deleting your account, please see the FAQs
eid_iosScanDialog_sessionStarted: Keep your ID below the top half of your cell phone.
eid_iosScanDialog_sessionSucceeded: Your ID card has been scanned successfully.
eid_pin_faq_link:
Where can I find my PIN?
For more information, see the FAQ.
eid_can_faq_link:
Where can I find my CAN?
For more information, see the FAQ.
eid_aboutVerification_image_alt: An identity card with a hook
eid_aboutVerification_content_title: You need one of the following ID documents
eid_aboutServiceProvider_subtitle: You would like to identify yourself with the following provider:
eid_aboutServiceProvider_accessRights_su: By entering your PIN, you grant the provider access to the following data on your ID card.
eid_aboutVerification_content_text: Before we can release your budget, we need a successful identification. In the next steps, you will be guided through the identification process.
eid_cancel_flow_text: You can restart the identification process at any time. If you forget your PIN, you can request a new one here.
eid_document_germandID: ID card with online identity card function for German citizens
eid_document_nonEuID: Electronic residence permit for non-EU citizens
eid_aboutVerification_faq_link: For more information about identification, please see our FAQ page.
eid_aboutVerification_dataprivacy_link: Link to the detailed data protection notes
eid_aboutVerification_accept_text: By choosing “Agreed”, you agree that once you have entered your PIN, we will read and process data from your ID document as described in the data protection notices. You can find the privacy notices here:
eid_insertCard_image_alt: An ID card behind the top of a mobile phone
eid_insertCard_content_text: Now place your ID card at the back of your smartphone so that half of it is above.
eid_insertCard_faq_link: For more information about identification with the online ID feature, please see our FAQ page.
eid_pinView_content_text: Have you already created a 6-digit PIN you chose yourself? Then enter it here.
eid_pinView_notChanged_text: You haven't changed the PIN from the PIN letter yet?
eid_canView_content_text: You have entered your PIN incorrectly twice. Before the third attempt, you must first enter your access number (CAN). The CAN is the 6-digit number on the front of your ID card (to the right of the "valid until" date).
eid_transportPinView_content_text: You also received a PIN letter with your identity card. You can also use this so-called transport PIN to identify yourself online with your ID card. Enter the PIN from the PIN letter here.
eid_newPinView_content_text: Assign your own PIN so that you can use the ID card online.
eid_newPinView_confirmNewPin_pinNotMatch: The two PIN numbers do not match.
eid_verificationCompletion_content_text: Your budget has now been released. Enjoy it!
eid_changePinCompletion_content_text:
You have successfully changed your PIN and can now identify yourself with your new PIN.

You can always use this PIN for the online ID function in future.
eid_startVerify_button_text: Identify yourself to get your budget!
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_title: Your smartphone is not NFC capable.
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_text: Alternative options can be found in the FAQ.
eid_nfcNotSupported_content_link: You can find more information on identification with the online ID function in the FAQ.
favorites_item_remove_a11y_label: Click here to remove the favorite
favorites_no_favorites_hint: Here you can see your favorites
favorites_unauthorized_no_favorites_titl: Sign up to see your favorites
favorites_unauthorized_no_favorites_hint: Once you're logged in, you can see your favorites, edit them, and add new ones
favorites_empty_no_favorites_hint: Here you can see your favorites.
login_form_noAccount_text: Are you 18? Then register here to unlock your budget!
onboarding_aboutApp_content_text:
With a budget of <bold>200 €</bold>, we would like to give you the opportunity to experience culture in your region. Using the app, you can find offers nearby.

Technically necessary cookies are used when using the app. Details on this and further information on data protection are described in our data protection information:
onboarding_aboutApp_image_alt: A book, sheet music, a CD, a picture and a film flap float around the app icon.
onboarding_locationPermission_content_te: <bold>Specify your location!</bold> To suggest more suitable cultural offers to you, we want to use your location while using the app. Alternatively, if you do not want this, you can enter your postal code, which is then used to search for cultural offers. You can change this setting in your profile at any time.
onboarding_notificationPermission_conten: <bold>Keep up to date with the latest news!</bold> Allow notifications so that we can always let you know when something new happens.
productDetail_getProductDetailError_mess: An error occurred while opening the product.
productDetail_confirmReservation_consent: By confirming "Book now" you make a reservation for the offer shown above.
Link to the detailed data protection notes
productDetail_reservationError_message: An error occurred while reserving the product.
reservationDetail_qrCode_hint: You can redeem this QR code with the provider mentioned below.
reservationDetail_footer_refunds: from the total price of {{totalWithoutRefunds}} you got {{refundAmount}} back
reservationDetail_header_deliveryScenari: Your reservation has been received but has not yet been accepted by the provider.
Your reservation is being made available. You will be notified by email when your product is ready for pickup.
This reservation is ready for pickup. You can show this code to the seller. If you still want to cancel the reservation, please contact the seller.
Redeem the voucher with the provider. If you still want to cancel the reservation, please contact the seller.
Your order has been picked up.
Your order has been picked up.
Your reservation has been cancelled. This can happen if you cancel or if the retailer didn't accept the reservation.
reservations_unauthorized_no_reservation: Sign in to see your reservations
Log in to see your reservations
reservations_list_noPendingItems_content: Here you can see your reservations. You can use pull-to-refresh to refresh the display.
reservations_list_noCompletedItems_conte: You haven't redeemed a reservation yet
registration_success_todo_information: In the next step, you need to identify yourself. This will unlock your budget.
registration_consent_headline: Terms of Use and Privacy Notices
registration_consent_eula_headline: Please agree to the EULA and take note of the privacy notices.
registration_consent_eula_copytext: To register, you must agree to the current Terms of Use (EULA). The EULA contains general conditions and the contractual basis for using the app. You can get it here and at any time in your profile:
registration_consent_data_privacy_copyte: In the data protection notes, we explain which data we collect and process for which purposes when using the app. Please take note of these privacy notices, which you can call up at any time in your profile:
registration_consent_data_privacy_linkte: Link to the detailed data protection notes
registration_consent_data_privacy_checkb: I have taken note of the privacy notices.
registration_data_privacy_introtext: To create your profile, we will only process the most necessary data from you:
registration_data_privacy_item2: The password you want to set
registration_data_privacy_item3: Your name in case you're angering it
registration_data_privacy_item4: Your date of birth, if you fear it
registration_data_privacy_item5: Your favorites, in case you're angering them
registration_data_privacy_item6: Your zip code if you give it
registration_data_privacy_copytext:
By confirming with “Agreed”, you declare:

<extrabold> “I agree that you will process my personal data as described in the privacy notices under the heading “Registration” to create a user account.”</extrabold>

You can find information on how to withdraw your consent statement in the data privacy notices under “Registration”.
registration_data_privacy_linktext: Link to the detailed data protection notes
registration_data_privacy_cancel_dialog_: Do you want to cancel the registration? You can also register later at any time.
registration_cancel_alert_title: Are you sure you want to cancel?
registration_cancel_alert_text: Your entries have not yet been saved. You're not registered yet.
registration_preferences_cancel_alert_ti: Are you sure you want to cancel?
registration_preferences_cancel_alert_te: Your preferences are not yet stored. We can't make any suitable recommendations for you like that.
form_error_password_min_length: Password is too short. Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long.
form_error_password_character_groups: Password too weak. The password must consist of at least {{count}} different characters.
preferences_location: If you have not specified your location, you can alternatively specify your postal code here. This allows us to make you more suitable cultural offers.
preferences_your_preferences_description: Complete your profile so that we can make more suitable recommendations for you.
forgotPassword_copytext: Give us your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordSuccess_copytext: We sent a link to the email address you provided. You can use this link to create a new password.
cdc_invalid_loginid_message: Cannot log in because the combination of email and password is invalid
account_verification_description: Please confirm your email address to continue the registration process.
account_verification_description_success: Email sent. If you didn't get them, you can try again in 1 minute.
cancellation_confirmation_alert_descript: Do you really want to cancel your order?
not_yet_entitled_button_text: Take a look around! You won't get your budget until you're 18, but until then you can get inspired and set favorites.
verification_duplicate_text: Your budget could not be unlocked because there is already someone with your identification data. Please check the <faqLink>FAQ</faqLink> for how to proceed.
